response.summary:
Technical and Innovation Leader in R&D Teams. I am Chemical engineer with Master degree in Product Design and experience leading cross-functional innovation teams, working and managing projects for develop pipeline in beverages, dairy and plant based categories. 

Excellent interpersonal skills, responsible, disciplined, and respectful; with achievement orientation, in-depth viewpoints, good communication skills, willingness to continuous improvement, and readiness to approach teamwork. 

In my ongoing learning process, I consider myself to be a practical and analytical professional, oriented to apply the knowledge acquired in through academic and professional experience to the development of solutions to today's specific challenges in the engineering industry.
response.skills: Capex, Economía circular, Entrega de proyectos, Inglés, Cross-functional Team Leadership, Innovation Management, Business Case Modelling, Intrapreneurship, Process Engineering, Process Simulation, Chemical Engineering, Product Development, Consumer Products, Project Engineering, Process Control, Petroleum, P&ID, Energy, Engineering, Gas

profile_positions.description:
As Head R&D Manager, I am accountable for the new product development pipeline of more than 100 projects each year.
I support the creation of entire lines of new products and new business models in dairy, beverages, and plant-based categories while administering project budgets of $ (2 MIlions USD).
I responsible to explore different products, technologies, and capabilities with current plants and new contract manufacturers to achieve business needs.
I lead a cross-functional team of more than 20 people
profile_positions.title: R&D Head Manager

profile_positions.description: As an Innovation Manager in R&D team, I am accountable for the new product development pipeline of more than 100 projects each year. I support the creation of entire lines of new products and new business models in dairy, beverages and plant based categories while administering project budgets of $ 0,5 MUSD. I led cross-functional and of more than 12 people.
profile_positions.title: R&D Innovation Manager

profile_positions.description: Managing projects for the innovation to improve existing products and procedures to lead the development of Dairy and non Dairy products.
profile_positions.title: Jefe Investigación, Desarrollo e Innovación

profile_positions.description:
- Manage/Coordinate technical support for project initiatives in the Beverage category
- Acquires knowledge of our customer products and processes and applies this knowledge to the development of new products
-Project management - Manage briefs and champion required actions to meet project objectives
profile_positions.title: Brand Engineer Master R&D

profile_positions.description:
Brand Engineer Sr R&D
• Develop technical expertise related to all product development areas.
• Develop profitable and opportune goods which gladly satisfy consumer needs.
• Assure the continuous improvement of the productive process and the performance of assigned brands.
profile_positions.title: Brand Engineer Sr R&D

profile_positions.description:
Preparation of basis of design, process simulations, mass and heat balances, drawings (PFD, P&ID), hydraulic calculations, equipment sizing and selection, process data sheets, sizing reports,  lists tie-ins lines.

Developing process simulations in  Hysys and Stoner Pipeline Simulator SPS®
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Producing and developing process simulations (Aspen Hysys). 
- Making calculations for equipment specification leading to development of equipment datasheets. 
- Oil and gas production facilities design.
- Developing Process Flow Diagrams (PFD) and Piping & Instrument Diagrams (P&ID). 
- Writing process design documentation including the process basis of design, design philosophies and other reports. 
- Liaising with other engineering disciplines (mechanical, piping and layout, electrical, etc.). 
- Performing technical reviews of vendor documentation.
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer

profile_positions.description:

company.name: Alquería
company.description:
Alquería es un sueño que inició hace 64 años con la misión de llevar una botella de leche, una botella de salud a cada hogar colombiano. Hoy, medio siglo después con presencia a nivel nacional en 7 regionales. En Alquería nutrimos el futuro de Colombia transformando sueños en realidades.

Cada uno (a) de nuestros (as) Colaboradores (as) es un (a) líder Alquería, una persona con alto sentido humano, motivado (a) por la pasión y el talento de quienes lo (a) rodean, capaz de generar confianza e inspirar a otros (as).

Le damos sentido a nuestro trabajo: innovando, soñando y construyendo país.
